item.description:
DUE TO SNOW/ICE CONDITIONS, THE DATE OF THIS EVENT HAS CHANGED. POSSIBLY THE FIRST WEEKEND IN MARCH BUT WILL CONFIRM NEXT WEEK.

OK, esteemed colleagues. It's time for the 2013 SLED DOG RACES! Wooohoooooo!

Here's the deal. The Lakes Region Sled Dog Club (lrsdc.org) holds its races this weekend - I am planning for Saturday. I spoke to the organizer and she said we could photograph at the start/finish line - the race runs through and around downtown.

The first race begins at 8:30 - we should arrive by 8 a.m. I will plan to meet those of you going at the start/finish line. The next race doesn't begin until 12 noon and the final one of the day is at 1 p.m.

In-between, there will be great shots of people, dogs, the town, dogs, more people, dogs. You get the point. After all, it is a sled dog race. There are coffee shops and pubs - depending on the time of day - or who cares about the time of day, we can stop in either or both.

Some of us did this 2 years ago in Tamworth and it was great fun. Best advice: dress warmly. Hope to see you Saturday.

Â
item.name: Bark, bark, bark, bark, bark, yowwwwlllllll ...
